name: Hit Me, Comrade, One More Time!
name_original: Hit Me, Comrade, One More Time!
description:
Hit Me, Comrade, One More Time!

How To Conquer:

Outlast enemy and take much joy in tears they shed. 
If you are still awake, you conquer all.

  • Slap (A or J): Slap and block fellow comrade.
  • Drink Vodka (S or K): Restore health and happiness, prevent slap.
  • Throw Potato (D or L): In Russia, potato eat you.
